quotes.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some hire public relations officers.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: It is the nature of all greatness not to be exact.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Greatness is more than potential. It is the execution of that potential. Beyond the raw talent. You need the appropriate training. You need the discipline. You need the inspiration. You need the drive.
quotes.author: Eric A. Burns

quotes.quote: There be three things which make a nation great and prosperous: a fertile soil, busy workshops, easy conveyance for men and goods from place to place.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: By constant self-discipline and self-control you can develop greatness of character.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: I don't confuse greatness with perfection. To be great anyhow isï¿½the higher achievement.
quotes.author: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.quote: There are some men who lift the age they inhabit, till all men walk on higher ground in that lifetime.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness.
quotes.author: Stewart L. Udall

quotes.quote: We have, I fear, confused power with greatness.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: The measure of a country's greatness is its ability to retain compassion in times of crisis.
quotes.author: Wilfred A. Peterson

quotes.quote: The secret of greatness is simple: do better work than any other man in your field - and keep on doing it.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of greatness: some men are born great, some achieve greatness and some have greatness thrust upon them.
